title: TriggerEffectMessage
description: Trigger a VJ effect. Toggle effects (blackout, freeze) use intensity 0 to disable. Timed effects (flash, strobe, pulse, wave, spiral, explode) auto-expire after duration.

intensity.description: Effect intensity (0 = disable for toggle effects, 0-1 for timed)

duration.description: Duration in milliseconds (ignored for toggle effects)
